Text: Hey! How do i watch it. There is no AVi/DivX file..? Hw shld i join the files? thnx ...
Use winrar and click any of the files
they dont join, i jst get a bunch of single files...

then you're doing it wrong; how I do it:

-dl'ed winrar
-installed winrar
-rightclicked any of the files from this download and chose 'extract here'
-after the extracting process ended I had my episode

Next EP is the last. Ashame but true..

I knew from the start. Josh Schwartz ran the show to the ground by writing marisha off, and got desperate and started to exprimente with the camera etc. for exemple... starting the show with a happening like that earthquake... the rewinding it to 24 hours before or whatever it was.
Josh Schwartz created it, still i blame him that it ends like this.

THANX for the ep.
